name: Additional rate taxpayer
description: Single person earning £150,000 - additional rate (45%) tax band

sources.description: Verified using online UK tax calculator for 2025/26
sources.notes: Personal allowance fully eliminated (income > £125,140). Taxable: £150,000. Income tax: £7,486 (basic @ 20%) + £27,054 (higher @ 40%) + £19,163 (additional @ 45%) = £53,703. NI: £2,994 (8%) + £2,017 (2%) = £5,011. Total deductions: £58,714. Net: £91,286
